text: @AndrewScheer Through covid-19 you have been all about bringing @JustinTrudeau down but when people point out that you did not wear mask at airport you don't respond and your bots attack @CBCNews for reporting the story. You should read the bible verse about the plank and the speck of sawdust

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
